synopsis.text: Crimvaelâ€™s halo may be broken, but his newfound companions are on a divine mission to rate the sexiest species in a world teeming with fantastical creatures and racy brothels. Stunk and Zel, two adventurers with a penchant for the pleasures of the flesh, welcome the angel into their fold as they journey from one red-light district to the next, leaving no stone (or species) unturned in their quest for carnal knowledge. From the fiery allure of salamanders to the bovine charms of cow-girls, these intrepid reviewers will stop at nothing to crown the ultimate best girl. But with opinions as diverse as the creatures they encounter, will they ever reach a consensus? Join the Yoruno Gloss reviewers and find out in Ishuzoku Reviewers, where beauty is truly in the eye (and other parts) of the beholder.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
